summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Gold Jewellery ERP Purchase Management (Phase 4). Backend APIs working excellently with 54/55 tests passing. Frontend UI fully functional with proper integration to backend services.

minor_issues.test: Create Purchase Order PO Number Format
minor_issues.issue: PO number format validation was too strict in test - expected 14 chars but got 13
minor_issues.impact: Test validation issue only, actual PO generation working correctly

passed_tests: Supplier creation with full details (name, contact, GSTIN, address)
Create purchase order with items and automatic PO number generation (PO-2024-XXXXX)
Get all purchase orders with status filtering
Get single purchase order by ID
Automatic stock update on PO receipt
Update supplier total purchases on receipt
Purchase page displays POs correctly with search functionality
Suppliers page displays all suppliers with proper details
Mark as received button functionality working
Navigation between Purchase and Suppliers pages
Add Supplier button and modal functionality
GST calculation and display in purchase orders
Supplier information display (phone, email, address, GSTIN, payment terms, total purchases)
